AI Description: Git is a distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency. It is an open-source tool that is widely used for source code management in software development.
Core Features: Distributed Version Control System, Branching & Merging, Security & Encryption, Staging Areas, Collaboration Tools
General Tags: Version Control, Software Development, Source Code Management
Research Field: Computer & Information Sciences, Software Engineering, Systems, & Development
